title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Online Higher Education Collaborative Group Learning Design—Positive Interdependence

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners complete group projects at least three times using online collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Slack).
Learners demonstrate individual accountability through peer and self-assessment, achieving at least 80% in individual contribution scores.
Learners apply collaboration skills (communication, conflict management) based on instructor feedback to resolve 90% of group issues.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
